nodes.text: Romina Foss was a female individual who was the associate of the explorer Fionn Tucat. The two hired a crew in order to mount an expedition to Lupal, a long-abandoned moon. After the red light emitted by Lupal's dying star drove the Shistavanen Kordus Vrak to attack his fellow crew, Foss managed to survive and escaped the moon with the excavation droid RF-U5 and the Lasat Borzul. The survivors believed they were safe, but the red light entered their starship's cockpit, and Borzul began to turn feral in a similar manner to Vrak.
